titleStmt.title: 17 Martii, 1646. The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen and commons of the City of London in Common-Councel assembled, this day delivered to the honorable, the Commons assembled in Parliament With the answer of the honorable House of Commons thereunto. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this petition, with the answer, be forthwith printed and published: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

England and Wales. Parliament. 17 Martii, 1646. The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen and commons of the City of London in Common-Councel assembled, this day delivered to the honorable, the Commons assembled in Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husband, printer to the honorable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Praying for the disbanding of the Army.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
